author: egli
msg: Link Management now assumes that internal links are of the form
If there is a match in a document file it is assumed that this is an
internal link and is treated as such (warning if publish with
unpublished internal links and warning if deactivate with internal
However this is not coordinated with the DocumentToPathMapper and will
probably fail if the URL looks different.
